entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 11:30 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.7°C

Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 87 %

Dewpoint: -9.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
